means: 对上帝的亵渎，亵渎的言词[行为]

sentence.Network_en: The MP described the killings as a blasphemy before God.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位下院议员称这些谋杀是在上帝面前的公然亵渎。

sentence.Network_en: His writings were branded as obscene and a blasphemy against God.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的著作被定为淫秽作品,是对上帝的亵渎.

sentence.Network_en: You have just heard his blasphemy!
sentence.Network_cn: 你刚刚听到他那番亵渎上帝的话了!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 僭妄，或亵渎(blasphemy)，对犹太人来说是妄称神的名字(也就是妄用神的权威)，必须治死(利24:16)。耶稣以问题来反问法利赛人，".…
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... blare v． 高声鸣叫 blasphemy n． 亵渎，渎神 blasphemous adj． 对神不敬的.
蓝宝易混单词_百度文库 ... bawdy 好色的 blasphemy 亵渎神明， v blatant 喧哗的，明显的.
...不愿故意用不敬的语言“触犯”上帝或魔鬼撒旦 ,犯“亵渎神灵”(blasphemy)之过 ;说话时毫不顾忌 ,经常使用诅咒语或者满口damn、hell …

list.abs: All great truths begin as blasphemy ., 所有伟大的真理开始都离经叛道.
It felt like blasphemy . Or at the very least , horribly irreverent ., 感觉起来像是亵渎 . 或至少是可怕的不敬.
two moderate politicians have been assassinated for advocating reform of the unjust blasphemy law .两个温和的政治家被暗杀了，原因是他们主张对不公正的亵渎法进行改革。
that it was black blasphemy and perversion ., 它是邪恶的亵渎和堕落.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French, via ecclesiastical Latin from Greek blasphēmia 'slander, blasphemy'

entry.tran: 亵渎上帝（或宗教）的言行
entry.def: You can describe something that shows disrespect for God or a religion as blasphemy .

example.ex: He was found guilty of blasphemy and sentenced to three years in jail...
example.tran: 他被判犯有亵渎神明罪，刑期3年。

example.ex: The MP described the killings as a blasphemy before God.
example.tran: 这位下院议员称这些谋杀是在上帝面前的公然亵渎。

means.word_mean: 1. blasphemous language (expressing disrespect for God or for something sacred)
2. blasphemous behavior; the act of depriving something of its sacred character;

auth_sentence.content: Lifting himself into notoriety on the stilts of blasphemy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lifting himself into notoriety on the stilts of blasphemy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lifting himself into notoriety on the stilts of blasphemy.

auth_sentence.content: For a hands-on business titan, this was blasphemy.
auth_sentence.res_content: For a hands-on business titan, this was blasphemy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For a hands-on business titan, this was blasphemy.

auth_sentence.content: I will leave the issue of blasphemy to experts.
auth_sentence.res_content: I will leave the issue of blasphemy to experts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I will leave the issue of blasphemy to experts.

sentences.cn: 你刚刚听到他那番亵渎上帝的话了！
